verses.text: And there was a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Micah|strong="H4321"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, The eleven \w hundred|strong="H0505"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* that were \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* from thee, about which thou \w cursedst|strong="H0422"\w*, and \w spakest|strong="H0559"\w* of also in mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, behold, the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \add is\add* with me; I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* it. And his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be thou\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And when he had \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* the eleven \w hundred|strong="H0505"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* to his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I had \w wholly|strong="H6942"\w* \w dedicated|strong="H6942"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* from my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* for my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w* and a molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*: now therefore I will \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* it unto thee.

Yet he \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* unto his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*; and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them to the \w founder|strong="H6884"\w*, who \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thereof a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w* and a molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*: and they were in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4321"\w*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* had an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and \w teraphim|strong="H8655"\w*, and \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, who became his \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft consecrated: Heb. filled the hand\f*

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add there was\add* no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add but\add* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in his own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

¶ And there was a young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* out of \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w* of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, who \add was\add* a \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, and he \w sojourned|strong="H1481"\w* there.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* from \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* where he could \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add a place:\add* and he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, as he \w journeyed|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 17.8 \ft as he…: Heb. in making his way\f*

And \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Whence|strong="H0370"\w* \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* thou? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I \add am\add* a \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* of \w Beth-lehem-judah|strong="H1035"\w*, and I \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* where I may \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add a place\add*.

And \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with me, and be unto me a \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* by the \w year|strong="H3117"\w*, and a \w suit|strong="H6187"\w* of \w apparel|strong="H0899"\w*, and thy \w victuals|strong="H4241"\w*. So the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* went \w in|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 17.10 \ft a suit…: or, a double suit, etc: Heb. an order of garments\f*

And the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* was \w content|strong="H2974"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; and the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* was unto him as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*; and the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* became his \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and was in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*, Now \w know|strong="H3045"\w* I that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will do me \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, seeing I have a \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* to \add my\add* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.
